mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s.student_id, s.student_name, m.is_confirm FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN student s ON cr.account_id=s.student_id LEFT JOIN msg m ON s.student_id = m.from_id WHERE lecture_no=#{lectureNo}

SELECT from_id fromId, to_id toId, from_name fromName, msg_content msgContent, DATE_FORMAT(msg_send_datetime,'%T') msgSendDatetime, is_confirm isConfirm FROM msg WHERE from_id IN (#{studentId},#{teacherId}) AND to_id IN (#{studentId},#{teacherId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msg( from_id, to_id, from_name, msg_content, msg_send_datetime ) VALUES( #{fromId}, #{toId}, #{fromName}, #{msgContent}, NOW() )
